tag_list: philanthropy, portland-art-museum, portland-oregon, provenance-hotels, hospitality, tourism, nonprofits, oregon-health--science-university
overview:
Gordon Sondland, Portland businessman and philanthropist, is a founding member of Aspen Capital, founder of the Gordon Sondland & Katherine J. Durant Foundation, and serves on Oregon Health & Science University Foundation’s board of trustees.

310 NE Failing ST Portland, OR 97211

503-295-2122

http://www.sondlanddurant.org/
